item.title: MIUI V13.0.11.0.RGCINXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 11 India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 11 India

Codename: spes

Version: V13.0.11.0.RGCINXM | 11.0

Size: 4.0 GB

MD5: 99f6dea33f10b79584f0bbac328dc2d5

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to June 2022. Increased system security.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V13.0.4.0.SGCMIXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 11 Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 11 Global

Codename: spes

Version: V13.0.4.0.SGCMIXM | 12.0

Size: 5.8 GB

MD5: b1adc16fcdb212c31645612065def65a

Changelog:
[MIUI 13]
New: A new widget ecosystem with app support
Optimization: Improved overall stability
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to June 2022. Increased system security.
Stable MIUI based on Android 12
[More features and improvements]
Optimization: Mind map nodes are more convenient and intuitive now
Optimization: Enhanced accessibility support for Phone, Clock, and Weather

Download: Here
